              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="33%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Artikel
      29</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#220;ber
      den Bilanzgewinn verf&#252;gt die Generalversammlung im Rahmen der gesetzlichen
      Vorschriften. Der Verwaltungsrat unterbreitet ihr seine
      Antr&#228;ge.</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" rowspan="2" valign="top" width="11%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Allocation
      of Profit Shown on the Balance Sheet,</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Reserves</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="3%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="39%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      29</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      profit shown on the balance sheet shall be allocated by the Shareholders'
      Meeting within the limits set by applicable law. The Board of Directors
      shall submit its proposals to the Shareholders'
Meeting.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr><tr>
            <td valign="top" width="10%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="4%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="33%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Neben
      der gesetzlichen Reserve k&#246;nnen weitere Reserven geschaffen
      werden.</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="3%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="39%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Further
      reserves may be taken in addition to the reserves required by
      law.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr><tr>
            <td valign="top" width="10%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="4%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="33%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Dividenden,
      die w&#228;hrend f&#252;nf Jahren von ihrem Verfalltag an nicht bezogen worden sind,
      fallen der Gesellschaft anheim und werden der allgemeinen Reserve
      zugeteilt.</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="11%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="3%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="39%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Dividends
      that have not been collected within five years after their payment date
      shall enure to the Company and be allocated to the general
      reserves.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr>
            <td valign="top" width="10%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="top" width="4%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="33%" style="BORDER-TOP: black 0.75pt solid">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Abschnitt
      5:</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Aufl&#246;sung
      und Liquidation</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="11%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="top" width="3%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="39%" style="BORDER-TOP: black 0.75pt solid">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Section
      5:</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Winding-up
      and Liquidation</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr><tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="10%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Aufl&#246;sung
      und Liquidation</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="4%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="33%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Artikel
      30</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Die
      Generalversammlung kann jederzeit die Aufl&#246;sung und Liquidation der
      Gesellschaft nach Massgabe der gesetzlichen und statutarischen
      Vorschriften beschliessen.</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="11%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Winding-up
      and Liquidation</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="3%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="39%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      30</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Shareholders' Meeting may at any time resolve on the winding-up and
      liquidation of the Company pursuant to applicable law and the provisions
      set forth in these Articles of Association.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr><tr>
            <td valign="top" width="10%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="4%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="33%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Die
      Liquidation wird durch den Verwaltungsrat durchgef&#252;hrt, sofern sie nicht
      durch die Generalversammlung anderen Personen &#252;bertragen
    wird.</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="11%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="top" width="3%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="39%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      liquidation shall be effected by the Board of Directors, unless the
      Shareholders' Meeting shall appoint other persons as
      liquidators.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr><tr>
            <td valign="top" width="10%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="4%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="33%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Die
      Liquidation der Gesellschaft erfolgt nach Massgabe der gesetzlichen
      Vorschriften.</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="11%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="top" width="3%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="39%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      liquidation of the Company shall be effectuated pursuant to the statutory
      provisions.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr><tr>
            <td valign="top" width="10%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="4%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="33%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Nach
      erfolgter Tilgung der Schulden wird das Verm&#246;gen unter die Aktion&#228;re nach
      Massgabe der eingezahlten Betr&#228;ge verteilt, soweit diese Statuten nichts
      anderes vorsehen.</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="11%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="top" width="3%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="39%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Upon
      discharge of all certified liabilities, the assets of the Company shall be
      distributed to the shareholders pursuant to the amounts paid in, unless
      these Articles of Association provide otherwise.</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
            </td>
          </tr><tr>
            <td valign="top" width="10%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="top" width="4%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="33%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Abschnitt
      6:</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Bekanntmachungen,
      Mitteilungen</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="11%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="top" width="3%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="39%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Section
      6:</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Announcements,
      Communications</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr><tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="10%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Bekannt-machungen,
      Mitteilungen</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="4%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="33%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Artikel
      31</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Publikationsorgan
      der Gesellschaft ist das Schweizerische Handelsamtsblatt.</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Soweit
      das Gesetz oder die anwendbare B&#246;rsenvorschrift nicht zwingend eine
      pers&#246;nliche Mitteilung verlangen, erfolgen s&#228;mtliche Mitteilungen der
      Gesellschaft an die Aktion&#228;re g&#252;ltig durch Publikation im Schweizerischen
      Handelsamtsblatt. Schriftliche Mitteilungen der Gesellschaft an Aktion&#228;re
      erfolgen durch gew&#246;hnlichen Brief an die im Aktienbuch zuletzt
      eingetragene Adresse des Aktion&#228;rs bzw. Zustellungsbevollm&#228;chtigten. Als
      Zustellungsbevollm&#228;chtigte gilt insbesondere die Finanzinstitution, die
      Aktien f&#252;r wirtschaftlich Berechtigte h&#228;lt und in dieser Eigenschaft im
      Aktienbuch eingetragen ist.</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="11%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Announce-ments,
      Com-munications</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="3%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="39%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article
      31</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      official means of publication of the Company shall be the Swiss Official
      Gazette of Commerce.</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">To
      the extent that personal notification is not mandated by law or stock
      exchange regulations, all communications to the shareholders shall be
      deemed valid if published in the Swiss Official Gazette of Commerce.
      Written communications by the Company to its shareholders shall be sent by
      ordinary mail to the last address of the shareholder or authorized
      recipient entered in the share register of the Company. Financial
      institutions holding shares for beneficial owners and recorded in such
      capacity in the share register shall be deemed to be authorized
      recipients.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr><tr>

                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Sacheinlagen</font></div>

              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Diese
      Einlagen werden zu einem Wert von insgesamt CHF&#160;298'022'970

      Gesellschaft der Nestl&#233; AG, Cham und Vevey, 50'000 voll einbezahlte
      Namen&#173;aktien der Gesellschaft mit einem Nominalwert von
      ins&#173;ge&#173;samt CHF&#160;50'000'000 aus. Dabei werden bei der
      Gesellschaft CHF&#160;50'000'000 als Aktienkapital und
      CHF&#160;248'022'970 in die Reserven gebucht.</font></div>

              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="39%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Article&#160;32</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">In
      connection with the increase of the Company's share capital from
      CHF&#160;4,000,000 to CHF&#160;54,000,000, Nestl&#233; Ltd, Cham and Vevey,
      effects the following contributions:</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1)99.95%
      of the paid-in share capital of the company Alcon Pharma GmbH, with a par
      value of CHF&#160;25,486,890;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2)100%
      of the paid-in share capital of the company Alcon Ophthalmika GmbH, with a
      par value of CHF&#160;56,950;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3)99.62%
      of the paid-in share capital of the company Alcon-Couvreur N.V., with a
      par value of</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">CHF&#160;7,004,011;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4)100
      % of the paid-in share capital of the company Alcon Cusi S.A., with a par
      value of CHF&#160;83,875,354;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5)100
      % of the paid-in share capital of the company Alcon Finland Oy, with a par
      value of CHF&#160;131,950;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">6)100
      % of the paid-in share capital of the company Laboratoires Alcon S.A.,
      with a par value of CHF&#160;19,720,727;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">7)100
      % of the paid-in share capital of the company Alcon Laboratories (UK)
      Ltd., with a par value of CHF&#160;7,316,000;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">8)100
      % of the paid-in share capital of the company Alcon Laboratories Hellas
      Commercial &amp; Industrial S.A., with a par value of
      CHF&#160;651,050;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">9)100
      % of the paid-in share capital of the company Alcon Nederland B.V., with a
      par value of CHF&#160;28,424;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">10)99
      % of the paid-in share capital of the company Alcon Italia S.p.A., with a
      par value of CHF&#160;2,198,746;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">11)100
      % of the paid-in share capital of the company Alcon Norge AS, with a par
      value of CHF&#160;9,790;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">12)100
      % of the paid-in share capital of the company Alcon Polska Sp. z.o.o.,
      with a par value of CHF&#160;300,000;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">13)90
      % of the paid-in share capital of the company Alcon Portugal Produtos e
      Equipamentos Oftalmologicos, Lda., with a par value of
      CHF&#160;35,100;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">14)100
      % of the paid-in share capital of the company Alcon Sverige AB, with a par
      value of CHF&#160;18,190;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">15)100
      % of the paid-in share capital of the company Alcon Pharmaceuticals Ltd.,
      with a par value of</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">CHF&#160;100,000;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">16)100
      % of the paid-in share capital of the company Alcon S.A., with a par value
      of CHF&#160;100,000;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">17)100
      % of the paid-in share capital of the company Alcon Laboratuvarlari
      Ticaret AS, with a par value of CHF&#160;1,420,000;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">18)100
      % of the paid-in share capital of the company Alcon Laboratories (South
      Africa) (Pty) Ltd., with a par value of CHF&#160;58,528;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">19)100
      % of the paid-in share capital of the company Alcon Korea Ltd., with a par
      value of CHF&#160;200,000;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">20)100

      with a par value of CHF&#160;14,122;</font></div>

              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">22)100

      (Philippines), Inc., with a par value of CHF&#160;651,124;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">23)100

      value of CHF&#160;143,533;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">24)30
      % of the paid-in share capital of the company Alcon Laboratories
      (Thailand) Ltd, with a par value of CHF&#160;10,050;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">25)100
      % of the paid-in share capital of the company Alcon Laboratories
      (Australia) Pty. Ltd., with a par value of
CHF&#160;2,397,000;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">26)100
      % of the paid-in share capital of the company Alcon Canada Inc., no par
      value;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">27)100
      % of the paid-in share capital of the company Alcon (Puerto Rico) Inc.,
      with a par value of CHF&#160;142;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">28)100
      % of the paid-in share capital of the company Alcon Laboratories, Inc.,
      with a par value of CHF&#160;7,100;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">29)100
      % of the paid-in share capital of the company AlconLab Ecuador S.A., with
      a par value of CHF&#160;18,000;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">30)industrial
      and intellectual property.</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">These
      contributions are received at a total value of CHF&#160;298,022,970. In
      consideration for such contribution in kind, the Company allots to Nestl&#233;
      Ltd, Cham and Vevey, 50,000 fully paid re&#173;gistered shares of the
      Company with a total nominal value of CHF&#160;50,000,000. The Company
      enters into its books CHF&#160;50,000,000 as share capital and
      CHF&#160;248,022,970 as reserves.</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
            </td>
          </tr><tr>
            <td valign="top" width="10%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="4%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="33%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Aus
      Anlass der Kapitalerh&#246;hung der Gesellschaft von CHF&#160;54'000'000 auf
      CHF&#160;60'000'000, leistet die Nestl&#233; AG, Cham und Vevey, die folgenden
      Einlagen:</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1)ein
      Darlehen an Alcon Laboratories Inc. von CHF&#160;306'400'000,</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2)ein
      Darlehen an Alcon Laboratoires (UK) Ltd. von
      CHF&#160;16'585'200,</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3)ein
      Darlehen an Laboratoires Alcon S.A. von CHF&#160;37'240'200.</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Diese
      Einlagen werden zu einem Wert von insgesamt CHF&#160;360'225'400
      &#252;ber&#173;nommen. Als Gegenleistung f&#252;r diese Sacheinlage gibt die
      Gesellschaft der Nestl&#233; AG, Cham und Vevey, 6'000 voll einbezahlte
      Namen&#173;aktien der Gesellschaft mit einem Nominalwert von
      ins&#173;ge&#173;samt CHF&#160;6'000'000 aus. Dabei werden bei der
      Gesellschaft CHF&#160;6'000'000 als Aktienkapital und CHF&#160;354'225'400
      in die Reserven gebucht.</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="11%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="3%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="39%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">In
      connection with the increase of the Company's share capital from
      CHF&#160;54,000,000 to CHF&#160;60,000,000, Nestl&#233; Ltd, Cham and Vevey,
      effects the following contributions:</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1)a
      loan to Alcon Laboratories Inc. of CHF&#160;306,400,000,</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2)a
      loan to Alcon Laboratoires (UK) Ltd. of CHF&#160;16,585,200,</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3)a
      loan to Laboratoires Alcon S.A. of CHF&#160;37,240,200.</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">These
      contributions are received at a total value of CHF&#160;360,225,400. In
      consideration for such contribution in kind, the Company allots to Nestl&#233;
      Ltd, Cham and Vevey, 6,000 fully paid re&#173;gistered shares of the
      Company with a total nominal value of CHF&#160;6,000,000. The Company
      enters into its books CHF&#160;6,000,000 as share capital and
      CHF&#160;354,225,400 as reserves.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr><tr>

      8:</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Verbindlicher

                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Section
      8:</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Original

              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Falls
      sich zwischen der deutschen und einer anderen sprachlichen Fassung dieser
      Statuten Differenzen ergeben, gilt der deutsche
    Originaltext.</font></div>

      33</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">In
      the event of deviations between the German version of these Articles of
      Incorporation and any version in another language, the German authentic
      text prevails.</font></div>
